message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am unable to meet at $12,000. I would like to stick to my maximum of $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
